title: Hour 1: Judge-ment Day
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. and Chris "Mad Dog" Russo debate how significant Aaron Judge's 60th homerun of the season is to his career. Kimberly A. Martin joins the show to give her take on if Aaron Rodgers can come out on top in his Week 3 matchup against Tom Brady and the Bucs. Plus, we debate if the 2-0 Dolphins are a real threat to the Bills in the AFC East. After a winning performance by Jalen Hurts in the Eagles' MNF victory over the Vikings, the crew debates how high they should be on the quarterback going into Week 3.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: How significant is Aaron Judge reaching 60 homeruns this season?
